file_content.text: Greetings, visitor. I am... I can answer queries regarding geography, hist... error. Please tell me how I may serve you.
Start with the basics. What is this planet, and how do I leave it?
I want off this world.
I came here aboard a starship. I had people with me. Tell me where they are.
Help find my crew.
Are you some kind of droid? You look human, but sound like a machine.
What are you?
This is the Selruvian biome, sector eight-thousand twenty-two of the engineered world designated Iokath.
Well, that clears it up.
Commander.
Torian! I wasn't sure you survived Vaylin. Do you know how we got here?
Thank the stars you're alive!
Hoped you could tell me.
We're stranded on an alien world, and you don't seem the least bit worried.
You're taking all this well.
Doesn't mean I'm not concerned.
Sneaking up behind me will get you killed, Torian.
I almost attacked you.
Sorry, didn't want to interrupt you.
I was on the bridge, there was a bright light, and I woke up on this dar'yaim surrounded by machines trying to kill me.
Please tell me how I may serve you. I can answer queries regarding geography, hist... error...
Trespasser. Disrupter. You pollute the garden.
Stay back!
We preserve. We cleanse.
Don't "Commander" me. Vaylin had you by the throat. I thought I'd never see you again.
Thank the stars you're alive!
I'll always find you, cyar'ika.
I am a composite appearance designed to facilitate communication... error...
I am unable to process your request. Please redefine... error...
Don't "Commander" me. Vaylin almost killed you. I thought I'd never see you again.
Thank the stars you're alive!
